Introduction

Yoo Seonho is a South Korean singer and actor under Cube Entertainment. He is currently one of the main casts of the hit variety show "2 Days and 1 Night."

When he was still an idol trainee, Yoo Seonho participated in the hit survival show Produce 101 Season 2, where he finished 17th place. After the show, he continued to train and eventually made his official debut on April 11, 2018, with the EP "Spring, Seonho."

Yoo Seonho appeared in dramas and eventually had a breakout role in the hit 2022 historical drama "Under the Queen's Umbrella." When the drama ended, he was announced as one of the newest cast members of "2 Days and 1 Night."
